alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Mountains; Santa Barbara County South Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 16 at 4:28AM PDT until March 16 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County South Coast and Santa Barbara County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Mountains; Santa Barbara County South Coast
